name: BERA TECH
description: I am BERA TECH WhatsApp MultiDevice Bot built in NodeJs to enhance the experience.

SESSION_ID.description: Ensure your session ID starts with 'TREX-MD$'

MODE.description: Set to 'public' for everyone or 'private' for owner-only mode.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Enable bot to automatically view statuses (true/false).

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Enable bot to send a message after viewing status (true/false).

STATUS_READ_MSG.description: Customize the message sent after viewing status.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Set the bot owner's phone number (including country code).

AUTO_READ.description: Enable bot to automatically read messages (true/false).

AUTO_TYPING.description: Enable bot to show 'typing...' when responding (true/false).

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Enable bot to show 'recording audio...' when sending a voice note (true/false).

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Enable bot to always appear online (true/false).

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Enable bot to auto-block spam numbers (only 212 country code).

REJECT_CALL.description: Enable bot to automatically reject calls (true/false).

AUTO_DL.description: Enable bot to automatically download media (true/false).

AUTO_REACT.description: Enable bot to auto-react to messages (true/false).

GEMINI_KEY.description: Set your Gemini AI API key (optional).
